about:
Hey! What's up?  Anyway, I'm nerfgun2002, , though I'm not sure how well you guys may know me, or if you even know me at all. If you see me around, feel free to say hi or ask me anything!

If there's anything you need to know, it's that I'm a nub, and I will always be a nub.





          
-------CURRENT OBJECTIVES----- (Updated April 1, 2015)

- Reach Prestige 2 in Nebula
